EntryName	TRI36_HUMAN
ProteinName	E3 ubiquitin-protein ligase TRIM36 (EC 2.3.2.27) (RING finger protein 98) (RING-type E3 ubiquitin transferase TRIM36) (Tripartite motif-containing protein 36) (Zinc-binding protein Rbcc728)
GeneName	TRIM36 RBCC728 RNF98
Length	60
Function	E3 ubiquitin-protein ligase which mediates ubiquitination and subsequent proteasomal degradation of target proteins. Involved in chromosome segregation and cell cycle regulation (PubMed:28087737). May play a role in the acrosome reaction and fertilization.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoplasmic vesicle; Secretory vesicle; Acrosome; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton
